# What is Jupyter notebook?


- Open source web application 

- Uses: 
  - Creating and sharing live code
  
  - Interactively develop and present data based projects
  
  - Holistic workflows for collaborative project development

- can be used with cloud services like:
  - [`r fontawesome::fa("github")` github](https://github.com/freddyfrancis)
  
  - [`r fontawesome::fa("cloud")` Onedrive](https://www.microsoft.com/en/microsoft-365/onedrive/online-cloud-storage)

## What is a Jupyter Notebook?

This is an R Markdown presentation. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.
